description: An access gate in a new riverside wall in Laxey will protect against future floods, a minister says.
title: Laxey floods: New river wall will be 'sealed and watertight'
title_page: Laxey floods: New river wall will be 'sealed and watertight' - BBC News
maintext: He added, however, that work carried out since the flooding was "commendable" and that the government "accepts that it is the consequence of many years of lack of maintenance".
